text: Travesia station is situated on the Southrail line of the Philippine National Railways in Guinobatan, Albay, Philippines. ==History== Travesia was built around 1981 as a replacement for the Guinobatan station after a bypass line was built to avoid the steep grades at Camalig but it was not until February 23, 1986 when services resumed and the station opened. Category:Railway stations in Albay Category:Railway stations opened in 1981 Category:Railway stations in the Philippines
title: Travesia station
